text: @realDonaldTrump @Varneyco I'm just taking a brief moment away from watching John Lewis's inspirational funeral to come here and tell you, the gig is up. You're a fraud & a grifter & your inaction on COVID-19 has crippled the economy and killed tens of thousands of people.
